_examples._description: This section contains example configurations for different scenarios. Remove this section in your actual spec-config.json file.

legacyProject.description: Configuration for projects migrating from .kiro/ paths

_fieldDescriptions.version: Configuration file version. Use semantic versioning (e.g., 1.0.0).
_fieldDescriptions.paths.specs: Directory for specification files. Must be a relative path ending with /. No absolute paths or .. allowed.
_fieldDescriptions.paths.steering: Directory for steering documents. Must be a relative path ending with /. No absolute paths or .. allowed.
_fieldDescriptions.compatibility.legacyMode: Set to true if using legacy .kiro/ paths. Enables backward compatibility features.
_fieldDescriptions.compatibility.warnOnLegacyPaths: Set to true to show warnings when legacy paths are detected during path resolution.
_fieldDescriptions.metadata.installedAt: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the system was installed. Auto-generated by install.sh.
_fieldDescriptions.metadata.installedFrom: Source URL or path from which the system was installed. Auto-generated by install.sh.
_fieldDescriptions.metadata.version: Version of the installed Spec-Driven Development system. Auto-generated by install.sh.
